title: Week In Review: Right-To-Work, Body Cameras On Cops, Immigration Lawsuit
teaser: Senate Majority Leader Scott Fitzgerald says the Senate will quickly take up so-called right-to-work legislation in the upcoming session. Joy Cardin’s guests of opposing perspectives discuss the ambition and Gov. Walker’s cool reaction to right-to-work. Plus, they weigh in on President Obama’s call for body cameras on police officers, Wisconsin’s lawsuit over Obama’s executive order on immigration, and other top national and state news stories.
